articles.title: ‘Murder Mystery 2’ Review: Adam Sandler and Jennifer Aniston in Netflix Sequel That Leaves No Room for Laughs - Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: The two stars return to solve another case in the streamer's follow-up to 2019's hugely popular comic thriller.
articles.content: To quote the evil Noah Cross in Chinatown, “Politicians, ugly buildings and whores all get respectable if they last long enough.” The same can be said of Adam Sandler, who spent years as a piñata for… [+5029 chars]

articles.title: Boygenius: Being called a tortured artist is depowering - BBC
articles.description: How the indie supergroup smashed conventions and defied expectations on their debut album.
articles.content:
"I hate live music," announces Phoebe Bridgers, festival headliner, four-time Grammy nominee and one-third of indie/alternative triumverate Boygenius.
"OK, that's not true but, God, 80 per cent of i… [+8258 chars]

articles.title: Prince Harry back in UK court for battle with Daily Mail publisher - Reuters UK
articles.description: Britain's Prince Harry returned to the High Court in London on Thursday where his lawyer fought an attempt by a newspaper publisher to throw out his and other high-profile figures' lawsuit that alleged widespread unlawful acts by journalists.
articles.content: LONDON, March 30 (Reuters) - Britain's Prince Harry returned to the High Court in London on Thursday where his lawyer fought an attempt by a newspaper publisher to throw out his and other high-profil… [+3794 chars]
